description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) and condition 11 (roof top structures) of planning permission ref. P2015/0887/S73 for 'The demolition of the existing office (B1 a) building and the erection of a seven storey building with basement to provide 9 residential units ( 5 x 2 beds, 2 x 3 beds and 2 x 1 beds) and 950 sqm of B1 (a) office (B1 a) floorspace, together with front landscaping and ancillary refuse and bicycle storage' granted on 10/11/2015 to allow for the construction of additional external plant equipment.
